sentences.cn: 中文的基本语序是主谓宾。
sentences.pinyin: Zhōngwén de jīběn yǔxù shì zhǔ-wèi-bīn.
sentences.en: The basic word order in Chinese is Subject-Verb-Object.

sentences.pinyin: Zhōngwén méiyǒu shítài biànhuà.
sentences.en: Chinese doesn't have tense changes.

sentences.pinyin: Zhōngwén méiyǒu dòngcí biànwèi.
sentences.en: Chinese doesn't have verb conjugations.

sentences.cn: 中文一般不区分单数和复数。
sentences.pinyin: Zhōngwén yībān bù qūfēn dānshù hé fùshù.
sentences.en: Chinese generally doesn't distinguish singular and plural.

sentences.pinyin: Xiān xué hǎo pīnyīn hěn zhòngyào.
sentences.en: Learning pinyin first is very important.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ hǎo! Hěn gāoxìng rènshi nǐ.
sentences.en: Hello! Nice to meet you.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jiào Xiǎoyǎ.
sentences.en: My name is Xiaoaya.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ shì Mǎláixīyà rén.
sentences.en: I'm Malaysian.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jīnnián shí'èr suì.
sentences.en: I'm 12 years old this year.

sentences.cn: 我的爱好是看书和看电影。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ de àihào shì kàn shū hé kàn diànyǐng.
sentences.en: My hobbies are reading and watching films.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen jiālǐ yǒu hěn duō shū.
sentences.en: We have a lot of books at home.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jīngcháng kàn xiǎoshuō.
sentences.en: I read novels often.

sentences.cn: 我家里有爸爸、妈妈、哥哥、姐姐和我。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jiālǐ yǒu bàba, māma, gēge, jiějie hé wǒ.
sentences.en: In my family there are dad, mom, older brother, older sister and me.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ méiyǒu dìdi mèimei.
sentences.en: I don't have younger brothers or sisters.

sentences.pinyin: Tāmen dōu xǐhuan yùndòng.
sentences.en: They all like sports.

sentences.cn: 哥哥喜欢和朋友一起打篮球。
sentences.pinyin: Gēge xǐhuan hé péngyou yìqǐ dǎ lánqiú.
sentences.en: My brother likes playing basketball with friends.

sentences.pinyin: Jiějie xǐhuan yóuyǒng.
sentences.en: My sister likes swimming.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ bù xǐhuan yùndòng.
sentences.en: I don't like sports.

sentences.cn: 比起运动，我更喜欢看书。
sentences.pinyin: Bǐqǐ yùndòng, wǒ gèng xǐhuan kàn shū.
sentences.en: Compared to sports, I prefer reading.

sentences.cn: 姐姐也喜欢看书。她喜欢看漫画。
sentences.pinyin: Jiějie yě xǐhuan kàn shū. Tā xǐhuan kàn mànhuà.
sentences.en: My sister also likes reading. She likes reading comics.

sentences.cn: 我们家附近有一座图书馆。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen jiā fùjìn yǒu yī zuò túshūguǎn.
sentences.en: There's a library near our house.

sentences.cn: 我和姐姐经常去那里看书。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ hé jiějie jīngcháng qù nàlǐ kàn shū.
sentences.en: My older sister and I often go there to read.

sentences.pinyin: Túshūguǎn hěn dà, shū yě hěn duō.
sentences.en: The library is huge, and there are a lot of books.

sentences.pinyin: Měitiān lái jiè shū de rén hěn shǎo.
sentences.en: Few people come to borrow books every day.

sentences.pinyin: Suǒyǐ huánjìng fēicháng ānjìng.
sentences.en: So it's very quiet.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jīntiān yě qù le túshūguǎn.
sentences.en: I went to the library today as well.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ jiè le yī běn zhēntàn xiǎoshuō.
sentences.en: I borrowed a detective novel.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuan kàn zhēntàn xiǎoshuō ma?
sentences.en: Do you like detective novels?

vocab.en: a long time (lit. half a day)

sentences.cn: 前天我们找到了一只小猫。
sentences.pinyin: Qiántiān wǒmen zhǎodào le yī zhī xiǎo māo.
sentences.en: We found a kitten two days ago.

sentences.cn: 我们一家人在公园散步。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen yī jiā rén zài gōngyuán sànbù.
sentences.en: My family and I were taking a stroll in the park.

sentences.cn: 突然，我们听到了一声喵。
sentences.pinyin: Tūrán, wǒmen tīngdào le yī shēng miāo.
sentences.en: Suddenly, we heard a meow.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen zhǎo le bàntiān.
sentences.en: We searched for quite a while.

sentences.cn: 最后在树下面找到了一个箱子。
sentences.pinyin: Zuìhòu zài shù xiàmiàn zhǎodào le yī gè xiāngzi.
sentences.en: In the end, we found a box under a tree.

sentences.pinyin: Shǒujī zài zhuōzi shàngmiàn.
sentences.en: The phone is on the table.

sentences.pinyin: Xiǎo māo zài shù xiàmiàn shuìjiào.
sentences.en: The kitten is sleeping under the tree.

sentences.cn: 我想告诉你一个好消息。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng gàosu nǐ yī gè hǎo xiāoxi.
sentences.en: I want to tell you some good news.

sentences.cn: 我们终于领养了那只小猫！
sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen zhōngyú lǐngyǎng le nà zhī xiǎo māo!
sentences.en: We finally adopted the kitten!

sentences.cn: 它现在是我们家的一份子了。
sentences.pinyin: Tā xiànzài shì wǒmen jiā de yī fènzi le.
sentences.en: It's now part of our family.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng jiào tā Xiǎo Xuě.
sentences.en: I want to call it Snowy.

sentences.cn: 因为它的毛又白又软，看起来像雪一样。
sentences.pinyin: Yīnwèi tā de máo yòu bái yòu ruǎn, kàn qǐlái xiàng xuě yīyàng.
sentences.en: Because its fur is white and soft, it looks just like snow.

sentences.cn: 小雪很可爱，我们都很喜欢它。
sentences.pinyin: Xiǎo Xuě hěn kě'ài, wǒmen dōu hěn xǐhuan tā.
sentences.en: Snowy is cute, and we all love it.

sentences.cn: 明天我们会去宠物店买猫粮和床。
sentences.pinyin: Míngtiān wǒmen huì qù chǒngwù diàn mǎi māoliáng hé chuáng.
sentences.en: Tomorrow we'll go to the pet store to buy cat food and a bed.

sentences.pinyin: Tā xiànzài zhèngzài shuìjiào.
sentences.en: It's sleeping right now.

vocab.en: to look after, take care of

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zuìjìn zěnmeyàng?
sentences.en: How have you been recently?

sentences.cn: 我前天终于考完了期末考试！
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ qiántiān zhōngyú kǎo wán le qīmò kǎoshì!
sentences.en: I finally finished my end-of-term exams two days ago!

sentences.cn: 为了庆祝，我们一家人去了海边。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile qìngzhù, wǒmen yī jiā rén qù le hǎibiān.
sentences.en: To celebrate, my family went to the beach.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen dānxīn Xiǎo Xuě huì mílù.
sentences.en: We were worried Snowy would get lost.

sentences.cn: 所以请求了邻居照顾小雪。
sentences.pinyin: Suǒyǐ qǐngqiú le línjū zhàogù Xiǎo Xuě.
sentences.en: So we asked our neighbour to look after Snowy.

sentences.cn: 暑假你能来马来西亚玩吗？
sentences.pinyin: Shǔjià nǐ néng lái Mǎláixīyà wán ma?
sentences.en: Can you come to Malaysia during summer holidays to visit?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ kěyǐ jìnlái ma?
sentences.en: May I come in?

sentences.cn: 我现在和妈妈坐在海滩上。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiànzài hé māma zuò zài hǎitān shàng.
sentences.en: I'm sitting on the beach with mom right now.

sentences.pinyin: Māma zài chī sānmíngzhì.
sentences.en: Mom is eating a sandwich.

sentences.cn: 哥哥、姐姐和爸爸都在游泳。
sentences.pinyin: Gēge, jiějie hé bàba dōu zài yóuyǒng.
sentences.en: My brother, sister and dad are all swimming.

sentences.cn: 我也很想和他们一起玩。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yě hěn xiǎng hé tāmen yìqǐ wán.
sentences.en: I really want to join them too.

sentences.pinyin: Dànshì wǒ bú huì yóuyǒng.
sentences.en: But I can't swim.

sentences.pinyin: Zhèlǐ de fēngjǐng tài měilì le!
sentences.en: The view here is too beautiful!

sentences.cn: 长大以后，我想在海边买房子。
sentences.pinyin: Zhǎngdà yǐhòu, wǒ xiǎng zài hǎibiān mǎi fángzi.
sentences.en: When I grow up, I want to buy a house by the beach.

sentences.cn: 我拍了很多照片，回家之后一定会寄给你。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ pāi le hěn duō zhàopiàn, huí jiā zhīhòu yīdìng huì jì gěi nǐ.
sentences.en: I took lots of photos, I'll definitely send them to you after I get home.

sentences.cn: 今天是七月三十日，是我的生日。
sentences.pinyin: Jīntiān shì qīyuè sānshí rì, shì wǒ de shēngrì.
sentences.en: Today is July 30th, and it's my birthday.

sentences.cn: 过了今天，我就十三岁了。
sentences.pinyin: Guò le jīntiān, wǒ jiù shísān suì le.
sentences.en: After today, I'll be 13 years old.

sentences.cn: 爸爸妈妈带我们去了茶楼吃早餐。
sentences.pinyin: Bàba māma dài wǒmen qù le chálóu chī zǎocān.
sentences.en: My parents took us to a teahouse for breakfast.

sentences.cn: 我点了一些点心和一杯奶茶。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ diǎn le yīxiē diǎnxin hé yī bēi nǎichá.
sentences.en: I ordered some dim sum and a glass of milk tea.

sentences.cn: 吃完以后，我们去了电影院看电影。
sentences.pinyin: Chī wán yǐhòu, wǒmen qù le diànyǐngyuàn kàn diànyǐng.
sentences.en: After eating, we went to the cinema to watch a movie.

sentences.cn: 这个故事讲述了一条蛇和一个男人的爱情故事。
sentences.pinyin: Zhège gùshi jiǎngshù le yī tiáo shé hé yī gè nánrén de àiqíng gùshi.
sentences.en: The story tells the tale of a snake and a man's love story.

sentences.pinyin: Jīntiān shì xīngqī yī.
sentences.en: Today is Monday.

sentences.pinyin: Zhège dōngxi duōshao qián?
sentences.en: How much does this cost?

vocab.en: to fear, to be afraid of

sentences.cn: 我上个星期报名了一个游泳班。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ shàng gè xīngqī bàomíng le yī gè yóuyǒng bān.
sentences.en: I signed up for a swimming class last week.

sentences.cn: 班里有三个同学，都是女生。
sentences.pinyin: Bān lǐ yǒu sān gè tóngxué, dōu shì nǚshēng.
sentences.en: There are three other students in class, all girls.

sentences.cn: 其中一个和我一样，是初学者。
sentences.pinyin: Qízhōng yī gè hé wǒ yīyàng, shì chūxuézhě.
sentences.en: One of them is also a beginner, like me.

sentences.pinyin: Kāishǐ wǒ hěn jǐnzhāng.
sentences.en: I was very nervous at first.

sentences.cn: 学了以后，我发现游泳其实不难。
sentences.pinyin: Xué le yǐhòu, wǒ fāxiàn yóuyǒng qíshí bù nán.
sentences.en: After learning, I found that swimming isn't actually hard.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǐqián tèbié pà shuǐ.
sentences.en: I used to be particularly afraid of water.

sentences.pinyin: Māma yǐjīng gǔlì wǒ le.
sentences.en: Mom has already encouraged me.

sentences.pinyin: Tā sòng le wǒ yī jiàn xīn yǒngyī.
sentences.en: She gave me a new swimsuit.

vocab.en: desk mate (person sitting next to you)

sentences.cn: 过了这个星期，我就是初中生了！
sentences.pinyin: Guò le zhège xīngqī, wǒ jiù shì chūzhōngshēng le!
sentences.en: After this week, I'll be a junior high student!

sentences.pinyin: Shuō shíhuà, wǒ yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng.
sentences.en: To be honest, I'm a little nervous.

sentences.cn: 我听说初中学的东西比小学难很多。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ tīngshuō chūzhōng xué de dōngxi bǐ xiǎoxué nán hěn duō.
sentences.en: I've heard that junior high studies are much harder than primary school.

sentences.cn: 不知道我的同桌会是谁。
sentences.pinyin: Bù zhīdào wǒ de tóngzhuō huì shì shéi.
sentences.en: I don't know who my desk mate will be.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè shì shénme?
sentences.en: What is this?

sentences.pinyin: Shéi shì nǐ de lǎoshī?
sentences.en: Who is your teacher?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng mǎi nǎ běn shū?
sentences.en: Which book do you want to buy?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ zěnme qù xuéxiào?
sentences.en: How do you get to school?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ wèishénme bù gāoxìng?
sentences.en: Why are you unhappy?

vocab.en: what do you want to eat?
what do you do for work?
what would you like to drink?

vocab.pinyin: wǒ kěyǐ wèn nǐ yī jiàn shì ma?

vocab.en: what did you do this weekend?
what kind of music do you like?

vocab.cn: 你最喜欢的颜色是什么？
vocab.pinyin: nǐ zuì xǐhuan de yánsè shì shénme?
nǐ de shēngrì shì shénme shíhòu?
zhè jiàn yīfu kàn qǐlái búcuò
nǐ yǒu xǐhuan de yánsè ma?
vocab.en: do you have a favourite colour?
I want to go on holiday
I'm going to meet a friend

vocab.pinyin: wǒ kěyǐ zài nǎlǐ chī zhōngcān?
vocab.en: where can I eat Chinese food?
does this come in other colours?
I want a cup of tea

vocab.pinyin: wǒ juéde nǐ shuō de duì

vocab.en: keep it up! / you can do it!
how do I get there from here in the morning?

vocab.pinyin: nǐ zài zhèlǐ zhù le duōjiǔ?
vocab.en: how long have you lived here?
what time does the plane depart?
where is the nearest subway station?

vocab.pinyin: wǒ xiǎng dìng yī gè fángjiān
vocab.en: I want to book a room
excuse me, what is this place?

vocab.pinyin: zhè shǒu gē shì shénme yìsi?

vocab.en: how do you write this character?

vocab.cn: 这家餐厅的食物怎么样？
vocab.pinyin: zhè jiā cāntīng de shíwù zěnmeyàng?
vocab.en: how is the food at this restaurant?
what do you do for work?
how long have you been learning Chinese?
